subject: frozen pizza
body:
if you run down the highway just north of our house for a few miles, on the horizon to the north you can see a snow-capped mountain

the weather has been pretty bad and it isn't going to be nice this long weekend which sucks but it does look like it's going to get better soon

several team members told me that i am doing a good job at work and another separately DMed me to praise me about research i had done for a ticket

they converted the biweekly company health standup meeting to a zoom webinar instead of a meeting which is a subtle difference but meant that nobody's camera or mic was turned on which was nice

remembering when k didn't realize her camera was on during a team meeting and how she went to the kitchen and made a frozen pizza (i think) and everyone was watching

not actually doing yoga but just lying on the floor on a yoga mat as though you have just done yoga
